ll binomialCoeff(int n, int k)
{
  // Base Cases
  if (k==0 || k==n)
    return 1;

  // Recur
  return  binomialCoeff(n-1, k-1) + binomialCoeff(n-1, k);
}

int main()
{
    int n,m,h;
    gi(n);gi(m);gi(h);
    int a[m],sum=0,dep;
    rep(i,m)
    {
    	gi(a[i]);
    	sum += a[i];
    }
    if(sum<n)
    {

    	return 0;

    //sum--;
    if(sum-a[h-1]<n)

        printf("1\n");
        return 0;

    dep = a[h-1]-1;
    ll nm = binomialCoeff(sum - a[h-1],n-1);
    ll dm = binomialCoeff(sum - 1,n-1);
    float ans = (double)nm/((double)dm);
    printf("%.6f\n",ans );
    return 0;
}
